settings_sections.title: Installation
settings_sections.description:
To install Hull tracking library in your website start by whitelisting all domains it will be loaded on.
Then copy and paste the tracking tag in the `head` section of the HTML on each page you would like to track.

settings_sections.title: Tracking
settings_sections.description:
Configure the tracking library. By default it tracks all page view events, you can turn it off below.
Additional customization capabilities are described in [Hull.js reference](https://www.hull.io/docs/reference/hull_js/). If you need to deploy custom scripts you can use **Scripts** section below.

settings_sections.title: Scripts
settings_sections.description:
This sections allows to quickly load additional scripts in your webpage wherever Hull tracking tag is present.
Although any javascript file can be loaded, this section is especially handy when deploying client parts of other connectors from Hull organization. Check documentation to find urls to paste here.
All custom scripts will be injected and executed on every page load wherver the Hull Website tag is installed.
